course_description: Introductory workshop in fiction writing. Counts as a prerequisite for 300-level intermediate workshops but not for Advanced Fiction, Advanced Poetry, or Advanced Playwriting. May not be repeated for credit.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4312, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: T 2:30-5:15p, Instructor: T. Cage Conley, Status: Closed
